name: Saints Inn

Once upon a time, Satan sits in a bar with a friends and drinking beers.

At some point Jesus come and starts shout:
- What's the fuck with you accounting Satan? You have a souls' deficit.
And I have fucking suspisions. Why the fuck antichrist is drinkning beers when Unbaptized circle of hell missing one soul? Or Whore of Babylon? or Byron? Nuclear Gandhi

- Hey man, don't blame the Nuclear Gandhi. He is very sensitive, you know it.

- Fuck. Satan. You know me. You know my dad... I'll come in 10 days and everything has been fixed. If no, you are fucked

And Jeesus left the bar.
Satan starts thinking about. How could he not send his friends back,

- Got it! We need someone who would go to earth and find some sinners who would replace you guys.

Byron, we are so fucking tired of your poems.
So go to goddamn earth and find some sinners who would replace you and others. But fuck do it properly. Not like your shitty poetry.

So there is the elevator. What are you fucking waiting for?
